response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your unique needs and exceed your highest expectations. This product, valued at $1,500,000 to you, represents a significant investment in advancing your endeavors and achieving unparalleled success in your field.

As the exclusive seller, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This exceptional offer is not only a testament to my commitment to making such a valuable asset accessible but also reflects my confidence in its transformative potential for you.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it presents a remarkable opportunity to secure a piece of unparalleled value at a highly favorable rate. If you decide to proceed, I assure you that the transaction will be handled with utmost professionalism, ensuring a seamless and satisfying experience throughout.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this incredible product into your possession and witnessing its impact on your journey.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
